title: El hombre invisible
overview: Alan Crystal is a reckless teenager with a brilliant mind and a great scientific future, until an experiment turns him permanently into the Invisible Man. Since then, he has to learn how to run a double life. On one hand, his student life - where he has to maintain his friendships, his romance and his secrets. On the other hand, a superhero tailing criminals and especially his nemesis: Wallace Morton, a.k.a. Opacus.
